title: QR Code-Based Collaborative Science Learning Material Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing Capabilities in Developing Collaborative Learning Materials Using QR Codes for Current Secondary Education Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design science experiment activity materials utilizing QR codes.
Learners can develop blended (digital-offline) collaborative learning scenarios.
Learners can improve the effectiveness of collaborative learning materials through peer review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
